As of February 1, 2012, the city has an estimated population of 69,974 (28,581 households). The total area is 17.73 km². The city was founded when the town of Tsurugashima was upgraded to [[cities of Japan|city status]] on September 1, 1991. ==Adjoining cities and towns== * [[Kawagoe, Saitama|Kawagoe]] * [[Sakado, Saitama|Sakado]] * [[Hidaka, Saitama|Hidaka]] * [[Moroyama, Saitama|Moroyama]], [[Iruma District|Iruma]] ==Transportation== ===Rail=== The city is served by [[Tsurugashima Station]] on the [[Tōbu Tōjō Line]] and also [[Ippommatsu Station (Saitama)|Ippommatsu Station]] on the [[Tōbu Ogose Line]]. [[Wakaba Station]] on the Tōbu Tōjō Line lies on the city boundary between Tsurugashima and [[Sakado, Saitama|Sakado]]. Tsurugashima Station is approximately 40 minutes from [[Ikebukuro Station]] in Tokyo on the Tōbu Tōjō Line by direct express train. ===Bus=== [[File:Tsuru Wagon Wakaba Station 20111021.jpg|thumb|Tsuru Wagon community minibus in front of Wakaba Station, October 2011]] * Tsuru Bus community bus service * Tsuru Wagon community minibus service ==Culture== * Zennōji Temple ==Shopping== [[File:Wakaba Walk 20111021.jpg|thumb|Wakaba Walk shopping centre in front of Wakaba Station, October 2011]] *Wakaba Walk Shopping Centre ==Notable people== * [[Aria Jasuru Hasegawa]], footballer<ref name="kenmin">{{cite web |url= http://www.ken-min.com/index.php?md=region&tid=11000&sid=11241|title= 鶴ケ島市|trans_title= Tsurugashima City|date= 2011|work= |publisher= ken-min.com |location= Japan|language= Japanese|format= |archiveurl= |archivedate= |accessdate= 21 October 2011}}</ref> * [[Jin Katagiri]], comedian and member of the [[Rahmens]] duo<ref name="kenmin"/> * [[Ryuji Kawai]], footballer<ref name="kenmin"/> * [[Atsuko Sakurai]], actress<ref name="kenmin"/> * [[Hideaki Takeda]], footballer<ref name="kenmin"/> * [[Jun Uruno]], footballer<ref name="kenmin"/> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * {{Official website|http://www.city.tsurugashima.lg.jp}} {{ja icon}} {{Saitama}} [[Category:Cities in Saitama Prefecture]]
